title: Realm Glyphs (Part 1)
body:
Realm Glyphs (Part 1)

"Master, you finally woke up," Evan heard Illusia's relieved voice the moment he used his shadow senses.

"What's the matter Illusia?" When Evan heard Ilusia's voice, he raised his eyebrows because he could feel that she wanted to tell him something important.

"Master, the Dark Guild is planning to launch an all-out attack."

"What do you mean?" Evan's expressions turned serious and he asked while looking in Ronan's direction.

"A few days ago Sera and the other S Rankers of the Dark Guild called all the Dark Guild members back to their main base and told us that they are planning to launch an all-out attack and we need to prepare for it."

"By all out attack do you mean_" Evan didn't finish his sentence but Illusia already knew what he wanted to ask.

"Yes, they are planning to attack all the cities at the same time," Illusia confirmed what Evan was thinking.
